summary: This bill, the Mechanical Insulation Installation Incentive Act of 2025, proposes amending the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 10% tax credit for labor costs associated with installing mechanical insulation property. This includes insulation for mechanical systems meeting specific standards and installed in the U.S. The credit applies to costs incurred after December 31, 2025, and ends after December 31, 2028.  Conforming amendments are made to other sections of the code to reflect the new credit.
